description.raw:
@iche033  this should fix the issue with the master header.

However, I'm making this a separate PR because it requires an API change:

Everywhere that you were using

```
ign_install_all_headers(COMPONENT ...)
```

Needs to be changed to

```
ign_install_all_headers(COMPONENT <component_name> ...)
```

i.e. you need to explicitly state the component name instead of just specifying `COMPONENT`. It's kind of a nuisance, but it's the most straightforward fix that I can think of at the moment.

Feel free to merge this PR once your branch in `ign-rendering` is compatible with it.

Needs to be changed to

i.e. you need to explicitly state the component name instead of just specifying COMPONENT. It's kind of a nuisance, but it's the most straightforward fix that I can think of at the moment.

Feel free to merge this PR once your branch in ign-rendering is compatible with it.
